credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Charlie's Angels
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description:
Background: metallic gold, layered with a smaller rectangle in magenta, layered again with a page-size "A", covered with yellow and orange flames. At center of image, the photograph of three women posing confrontationally.
Inscriptions: lower center, "CHARLIE'S / ANGELS" in orange and yellow, succeded by "GET SOME ACTION" in green, and "COMING SOON" in gold.
name: Poster
